Reviews.Title: “Good basic accommodation”
Reviews.Author: FrancescoR
Reviews.Content: hotel 2star didnt expect luxury anyway bed television dvd player aircon internet wireless free clean comfortable bathroom rundown shower bu reception managed local maintenance staff fixed personnel recommend hotel short stays stopovers dont spend geylang socalled red light district wasnt disturbed

Reviews.Title: “Ok if u know it's a 2 star hotel”
Reviews.Author: Stanley John K
Reviews.Content: check late 2000 receptionist nice helpful little bit didnt bring baggage dont expect tour hotel nights stay ill manner happened quiet peaceful besides eateries corner nearby selling cheap

Reviews.Title: “A good choice, away from the CBD”
Reviews.Author: TONY S
Reviews.Content: located geylang near aljunied rail station downtown singapore changi airport santa grand outside zone skyscraper hotels found singapore accommodation geylang costly despite name hotel opulent overthetop santa grand clean adequate space comfortable bed shower airconditioning efficient aggressively cold reception staff helpful obliging breakfast available hotel couple 711 stores nearby food court day fine restaurants minutes kettle plus teacoffee provided

Reviews.Title: “no going back again”
Reviews.Author: cav0628
Reviews.Content: reach singapore morning 10am reach hotel request checkin staff helpful polite direct reject request reason staff bit check 12pm cant staff polite 2pm leave luggage hotel staff store location wise ok 15mins mrt station clean bit dirty smelly toilet dirty recommend stay

Reviews.Title: “great value room...”
Reviews.Author: HelenGomez
Reviews.Content: booked agent hotel perfect location red light district hardly noticed 10 mins mrt cozy clean including bbc news film channel 12 night stays singapore allowed store bags useful reception staff helped answer questions free wifi plus

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: GoneFishing58
Reviews.Content: checked stay hotel probably 10th time staying geylang district singapore expensive stay geylang budget waiting connecting flights hotels dirty noisy constant targets immigration police due district pros santa grand quiet convenient location safe mrt station 5 minute walk wide variety restaurants food stalls fair prices bed hard hot pot coffee fridge provided flat screen tv cons bit personal valubles

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: fring11
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights santa grand aljunied hotel geylang singapore redlight district notwithstanding absolutely safe quiet nice restaurants night bit city centre easily reach underground mrt station 10 minutes walk hotel stayed standard french bed mattress slept anyway fridge tv set aircon free wireless cons bit noisy due road traffic safe deposit nor reception

Reviews.Title: “Adequate small hotel in a terrible location”
Reviews.Author: Frank M
Reviews.Content: hotel evidently refurbished earlier dilapidated establishment result modern history example modern nicely furnished bathroom ugly economy hotel adequate staff helpful english poor reason access free wifi hotels location worst aspect walk nearest mrt station dirty town highly unattractive
